name: CleanNow
0:
”Alexa, turn on robot”
”Alexa, turn off robot”
”Alexa, what is battery on robot”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Clean Now can provide the ability of voice control robot vacuum cleaner by Alexa, It gives you more intelligent and convenient life. Below are the usage steps:
1, Download Clean Now App. Download link: https://log.livirobo.com/download/app/cleannow
2, Open the APP and log in the account.
3, Add your robot device to the account.
4, You can rename your device in the App, so you can easily control it by Alexa Dot.
5, Search “Clean Now“in the Alexa App, find this skill.
6. After clicking "ENABLE", the Clean Now App will be activated automatically and the authorization will be completed.
7. If the Clean Now App is not activated after clicking "ENABLE", but instead enters the page for entering the authorization code, it may be that your mobile phone system version is not up to date. You can manually switch to the Clean Now App and get the authorization code in "More Services - Alexa". Go back to the Alexa App and enter the authorization code to complete the authorization.
8, After authorization, wait for Alexa Dot to find the device .
9, After Alexa Dot find the device in the Clean Now, you can begin to control these devices by voice.
